revised_title: Worms in the Tongue and Other Body Parts: A Curious Case and Treatment
tldr: The author, Thomas Dent, shares his experience with a tongue disorder caused by worms. He describes his journey to find a treatment and the successful removal of over a hundred worms from his tongue and gums by a skilled woman doctor. This case highlights the existence of worms in body parts and the potential benefits of further investigation into their nature and treatment.
